StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateMudData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@ZipCode varchar(9) ,@Recrui.ngOrgID int ,@OssOrgID int ,@PsrssOrgID int ,@UserRecrui.ngOrgID int ,@LastEditBy varchar(15))
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
------------------------------------------------------------------- -- get the old ASSIGNED orgID DECLARE @AssignedOldOrgID int DECLARE @AssignedOldOrgGUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @AssignedOldOrgID = ASSIGNED_ORG_ID FROM [dbo].[MUD_FILE] WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
SELECT @AssignedOldOrgGUID = [rowguid] FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WHERE [ORGANIZATION_ID] = @AssignedOldOrgID
------------------------------------------------------------------- -- get the old OSS orgID DECLARE @OssOldOrgID int DECLARE @OssOldOrgGUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @OssOldOrgID = AssignedOSSOrgId FROM [dbo].[MUD_FILE] WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
SELECT @OssOldOrgGUID = [rowguid] FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WHERE [ORGANIZATION_ID] = @OssOldOrgID
------------------------------------------------------------------- -- get the old PSR orgID --DECLARE @PSROldOrgID int --DECLARE @PSROldOrgGUID uniqueiden..er
--SELECT @PSROldOrgID = AssignedPSRSSOrgId --FROM [dbo].[MUD_FILE] --WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
--SELECT @PSROldOrgGUID = [rowguid] --FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] --WHERE [ORGANIZATION_ID] = @PSROldOrgID
------------------------------------------------------------------- UPDATE [dbo].[MUD_FILE] SET ASSIGNED_ORG_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID, AssignedOSSOrgId = @OssOrgID, AssignedPSRSSOrgId = @PsrssOrgID, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = getdate() WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
--- UPDATE THE HISTORY TABLE WITH LATEST DATE EXEC [USMC].[UpdateMudHistoryLog] @UserRecrui.ngOrgID, @LastEditBy
------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Remove old org assignment from RSSOSS
IF @Recrui.ngOrgID != @AssignedOldOrgID AND @AssignedOldOrgGUID IS NOT null BEGIN
SELECT [SectorID] ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] ,[SectorDesignator] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpdateUserId] ,[SectorType] INTO #MapsSector_AssignedTemp FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] WHERE [Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] = @AssignedOldOrgGUID
INSERT into [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZipHist](SectorZipHistId, SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate) SELECT NewId(), SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_AssignedTemp) AND Zip = @ZipCode
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_AssignedTemp) AND Zip = @ZipCode
DROP TABLE #MapsSector_AssignedTemp
END
IF @OssOrgID != @OssOldOrgID AND @OssOldOrgGUID IS NOT null BEGIN
SELECT [SectorID] ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] ,[SectorDesignator] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpdateUserId] ,[SectorType] INTO #MapsSector_OssTemp FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] WHERE [Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] = @OssOldOrgGUID
INSERT into [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZipHist](SectorZipHistId, SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate) SELECT NewId(), SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_OssTemp) AND Zip = @ZipCode
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_OssTemp) AND Zip = @ZipCode
DROP TABLE #MapsSector_OssTemp
END
--IF @PSROldOrgID != @PsrssOrgID AND @PSROldOrgGUID IS NOT null --BEGIN
-- SELECT [SectorID] -- ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] -- ,[SectorDesignator] -- ,[LastUpdateDate] -- ,[LastUpdateUserId] -- ,[SectorType] -- INTO #MapsSector_PSRTemp -- FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] -- WHERE [Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] = @PSROldOrgGUID
-- INSERT into [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZipHist](SectorZipHistId, SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate) -- SELECT NewId(), SectorID, Zip, E.ec.veDate -- FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] -- WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_PSRTemp) -- AND Zip = @ZipCode
-- DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] -- WHERE SectorID IN (SELECT [SectorID] FROM #MapsSector_PSRTemp) -- AND Zip = @ZipCode
-- DROP TABLE #MapsSector_PSRTemp
--END
